title-group.article-title: ON ROOT POSETS FOR NONCRYSTALLOGRAPHIC ROOT SYSTEMS

abstract.p: We discuss properties of root posets for finite crystallographic root systems, and show that these properties uniquely determine root posets for the noncrystallographic dihedral types and type H₃, while proving that there does not exist a poset satisfying all of the properties in type H₄. We do this by exhaustive computer searches for posets having these properties. We further give a realization of the poset of type H₃ as restricted roots of type D₆, and conjecture a Hilbert polynomial for the q, t-Catalan numbers for type H₄.
